title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, January 26, 2022
description: It's the 92nd birthday of Jules Feiffer, born in the Bronx (1929). His career as a satirist included being a cartoonist, novelist, and playwright.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the 92nd birthday of Jules Feiffer, born in the Bronx (1929). His career as a satirist included being a cartoonist, novelist, and playwright.
